channel.title: computation on teukka.tech
channel.description: Recent content in computation on teukka.tech

item.author: taylor@teukka.tech (taylor thompson)
item.description: Computers are excellent tools for inducing altered states of consciousness. Unfortunately, these states are most likely to be fed by feelings of fear, anxiety, anger, or insecurity, with a distinctive outward focus, rather than looking inward and trying to augment more enlightened parts of ourselves like with more traditional spiritual tools.
